mapper.update: update D_USER set USER_PWD=#{userPwd} where USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: select USER_ID userId,USER_NAME userName,USER_SEX userSex,USER_BIRTHDATE userBirthdate,USER_CERTNO userCertNo, USER_ADDR userAddr,USER_ZIPCODE userZipCode,USER_TELNO userTelNo,USER_PHONENO userPhone,USER_EMAIL userEmail,USER_PWD userPwd from D_CUSTOM where ACC_NO=#{accNo}
